title: Composer's Solution Vol.2: Beautiful & Melodic Fantasy Cinematic Music
description: 13 Beautiful & Melodic Fantasy Cinematic Composer's Soundtracks (full preview avaliable)
longDescription:
[Composer's Solution Vol.2: Beautiful & Melodic Fantasy Cinematic Music] Pack contains

13 unique and interesting Composer's OST by Aquartos, WAVE format, 61 min of music:


Full preview with TimeCodes: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=65pwGA7U3W0


  1. Day 1
  2. Another World
  3. Manta
  4. Swift's Day
  5. Limitless
  6. Let Your Kingdom Come
  7. The Ways of the Spirit
  8. Depth
  9. Air Castles
  10. Old Photo Album
  11. Once Upon a Time
  12. The Valley
  13. The Sea of Nothing


Contact: AquartosProduction@gmail.com

technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Made with soul, without cliche and without copying other authors, from concept to mastering
  •  Unique Author's Sound by Aquartos
  •  Mastered special for games

Number of Audio Wavs: 13

Number of Audio Cues: 13

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 61

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


Thanks for your attention!
